item.title: Tamon’s B-Side Episode 9
item.content:encoded: It's interesting to see the speed of which Ouri and Tamon are coming to terms with their feelings towards Utage.

item.title: Journal with Witch Ep 8
item.content:encoded: Shit man, that ending hurts. I'm in tears, again!

item.title: Journal with Witch Ep 7
item.content:encoded: Holy crap, there's SO much to unpack in this episode!

item.title: Hana-Kimi Episode 7 – 9
item.content:encoded: I think I can speak for everyone when I say Mizuki's lack of self-awareness is absolutely infuriating to watch.

item.title: Love Through A Prism Ep 8
item.content:encoded: I'm not gonna lie. I'm kind of surprised that we're actually seeing Kit come to terms that he's probably in love with Lili this soon.

item.title: Tamon’s B-Side Episode 7 & 8
item.content:encoded: After everything that transpired in episode 6, Utage's head is a mess.

item.title: Love Through A Prism Ep 7
item.content:encoded: Wow... I'm shocked with the way they decided to wrap up this incident.

item.title: Journal with Witch Ep 6
item.content:encoded: HOT DAMN, IT'S GETTING SPICY!!!!! I'm sure I wasn't the only one who was screaming from start to finish of...

item.title: Love Through A Prism Ep 6
item.content:encoded: Man this was a rough episode for Lili.

item.title: Tamon’s B-Side Episode 6
item.content:encoded: We finally see the dark, possessive and even manipulative side of Tamon come out.
